s.text: The Netherlander reports that former Dutch central bank director and monetary expert Andre Szasz is gravely concerned about the success of the Economic and Monetary Union.

The Guyana Chronicle announces that the Electoral Assistance Bureau has determined December's Guyanese elections fair and valid.
